title: GOD FORBID Announces Two California Shows Celebrating Gone Forever
description: With Burton C. Bell, Skinlab, Exmortus, Thrown Into Exile, and more!
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 2 hours ago
excerpt: With Burton C. Bell, Skinlab, Exmortus, Thrown Into Exile, and more!
text: God Forbid will wrap up their 2024 with two Californian shows celebrating their Gone Forever album. The shows are happening in Sacramento and Los Angeles, and will feature openers Burton C Bell, Skinlab, Thrown Into Exile, and Exmortus depending on which of the two you attend. "We are very proud to announce 2 more additional shows to our upcoming run in California," wrote God Forbid. "Both headlining and we will be performing our Gone Forever album in its entirety. "Joining us in LA will be the legendary Burton C Bell formerly of Fear Factory, our old Century Media label mates and Bay Area rippers Skinlab, one of the most shredding and deadly Cali bands, Exmortus and our awesome buddies in Thrown Into Exile. Sac will feature Skinlab and Thrown Into Exile. "We have not played in Cali in over a decade, & we wanted to make sure you guys had an opportunity to hear the entire Gone Forever album (and a few extra). These will be special shows for the real GF fans. Tickets on sale Friday Oct 25th at 10am PST." 12/12 Sacramento, CA Harlows (w/ Skinlab & Thrown Into Exile)12/13 Los Angeles, CA The Regent (w/ Burton C Bell, Skinlab, Exmortus & Thrown Into Exile) Want More Metal? html:
God Forbid will wrap up their 2024 with two Californian shows celebrating their Gone Forever album. The shows are happening in Sacramento and Los Angeles, and will feature openers Burton C Bell, Skinlab, Thrown Into Exile, and Exmortus depending on which of the two you attend.

"We are very proud to announce 2 more additional shows to our upcoming run in California," wrote God Forbid. "Both headlining and we will be performing our Gone Forever album in its entirety.

"Joining us in LA will be the legendary Burton C Bell formerly of Fear Factory, our old Century Media label mates and Bay Area rippers Skinlab, one of the most shredding and deadly Cali bands, Exmortus and our awesome buddies in Thrown Into Exile. Sac will feature Skinlab and Thrown Into Exile.

"We have not played in Cali in over a decade, & we wanted to make sure you guys had an opportunity to hear the entire Gone Forever album (and a few extra). These will be special shows for the real GF fans. Tickets on sale Friday Oct 25th at 10am PST."

12/12 Sacramento, CA Harlows (w/ Skinlab & Thrown Into Exile)
12/13 Los Angeles, CA The Regent (w/ Burton C Bell, Skinlab, Exmortus & Thrown Into Exile)
